---
title: Bookmarked Insights
listing:
    type: grid
    contents:
        - ../book-reviews/[!.]*.qmd
        - ../book-reviews/*.md
    sort:
        - "date desc"
        - "title desc"
    sort-ui: [title, date]
    filter-ui: true
    categories: true
    date-format: medium

    page-size: 9
    fields: [image, date, title, author, reading-time, description, categories]
---
